name: Mission: Escape!
description:
Presentation

In Mission: Escape! You control a little girl called Lara.
After a few years, Lara was the victim of uncounted experiences to implant prostheses that give her new abilities. You must use these powers to reach your freedom.

Controls

Move: WASD

Interaction: E

Space: HIghjacking (to take control of the enemy's mind for a certain time)

Q: Pathfinder (to reveal the path of  the enemies)

Credits

Lucas Gonçalves Araujo: 2D Artist, 2D Animator, Sound Designer.

Kayo Monteiro Anjos da Silva: Programmer, Game Designer.
